content: PT-C Thermal camera Infrared camera for thermal imaging, for inspecting electrical, mechanical, piping, and HVAC applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Concrete scanners and sensors- - - ### FEATURES:Features High resolution – high resolution infrared (IR) camera offers matching infrared and optical picture and helps you accurately pinpoint thermal leaks or installation errors faster Wide temperature range – thermal imaging from -20 °C up to 600 °C covers a wide range of applications you need (including temperature calibration certificate) Save on service fees – conducting thermal self-checks can help you detect potentially costly repairs earlier and avoid fees for outsourced thermal services Robust ergonomic design – comfortable lightweight design and drop resistant up to 1.5m Easier documentation – transfer data via USB-C including, voice notes, infrared picture, and optical picture to help you quickly document your work Applications Electrical – checking temperature distributions in fuse boxes, electrical components, and cable connections for overloads or failures Mechanical – checking heating pipes, radiators, floor heating, air conditioning systems, and pipes for errors and leaks Energy and industrial infrastructure – checking steam installations for heat leakage, insulation damage, steam traps, tank levels, coolant pipes, and solar panels ### TECHNICAL DATA: Temperature -
